meanings.definition: The process of keeping financial records.
meanings.sent1: I learned about accounting in school.

meanings.definition: The profession or practice of maintaining financial records.
meanings.sent1: My uncle works in accounting at a big firm.
meanings.sent2: Accounting requires attention to detail and accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The accounting team always has a lot of work to do.

meanings.definition: A statement of money owed or paid.
meanings.sent1: I received the accounting for my credit card bill.
meanings.sent2: The accounting showed a balance due by the end of the month.
meanings.sent3: The accounting of the restaurant bill left me in shock.

meanings.sent5: He always double-checks the accounting before making payments.
